name: Unity New Forum Dark
description:
For people who want to be able to read the forum without getting blinded or having to scroll for miles between posts.

Version 0.5.1

Features:
- Dark skin
- No empty space at all
- Signatures are clearly separated from the post and are grayed out
- Bigger profile pics
- Fixed their broken image upload form and some other bugs

Forum thread:
https://community.unity.com/t5/g/c/td-p/2647011/
additional_info:
I just put an hour or few into this, so it might not be perfect.
Updates will come when I have more free time (and will) to work on it.

Edit: After adding a style by style in my the day to day use of the forum I think I have mostly completed the theme by now.
